# List Howto

## Create List
```{r}
my_list <- list(a=1, b=2)
my_list
```

### Rename elements
```{r}
element_names <- c('e1','e2')
names(my_list) <- element_names
my_list
```

### Different Types
```{r}
x <- list(1, "a", T, 1+4i)
x
```
